data.name: Schwarzerblitz - Cat-astrophe Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
If the first comment you had when booting up Schwarzerblitz was "not enough cats", here you are a g-nya-rly free set of three costumes for Amy, Jenn, and Renzo!
This DLC adds them automagically to the selection screen and they will be unlocked from the beginning.
data.about_the_game:
If the first comment you had when booting up Schwarzerblitz was "not enough cats", here you are a g-nya-rly free set of three costumes for Amy, Jenn, and Renzo!
This DLC adds them automagically to the selection screen and they will be unlocked from the beginning.
data.short_description: If the first comment you had when booting up Schwarzerblitz was "not enough cats", here you are a g-nya-rly free set of three costumes for Amy, Jenn, and Renzo! This DLC adds them automagically to the selection screen and they will be unlocked from the beginning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This DLC pack requires around 7MB of disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 740M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
